name: Agnostophobia (tinHatter)
description:
A horror puzzle game in which a creature stalks you in the dark, its only deterrent being light. However, each light switch turns on a light in a different room, and the building has limited power. Power the elevator in each level and escape with your life. 

A student thesis project.

Known Bugs:  Player will sometimes get stuck on doorway. Walk out and try again.
